citations.narrative:
Two water bottles had a mild to moderate build-up of algae growth.
All watering receptacles shall be sanitized when dirty: Provided, however, That such receptacles shall be sanitized
at least once every 2 weeks.
The water bottles were removed and replaced with clean ones.
Corrected at time of inspection.
Additional Inspectors
Drlica Steve, Veterinary Medical Officer

narrative:
3.55
WATERING.    
Two water bottles had a mild to moderate build-up of algae growth.
All watering receptacles shall be sanitized when dirty: Provided, however, That such receptacles shall be sanitized
at least once every 2 weeks.
The water bottles were removed and replaced with clean ones. 
Corrected at time of inspection.
Additional Inspectors
Drlica Steve, Veterinary Medical Officer

species.common: DOMESTIC PIG / POTBELLY PIG / MICRO PIG
